LanguageData.Tantrum.label: lanzando rabieta
LanguageData.Tantrum.beginletter: {0} is taking HIS anger out on nearby buildings!
LanguageData.Tantrum.recoverymessage: {0}'s destructive tantrum has come to an end.
LanguageData.Apathy.label: flojo
LanguageData.Apathy.beginletter: {0} has become apathetic and is less likely to do HIS assigned work.
LanguageData.Antisocial.label: evitando personas
LanguageData.SelfHarm.label: haciéndose daño
LanguageData.SelfHarm.beginletter: {0} has slit HIS wrists and is sulking in HIS room.
LanguageData.Abuse.label: gritando
LanguageData.Abuse.beginletter: {0} has become enraged and is verbally abusing all colonists in sight.
LanguageData.Abuse.recoverymessage: {0} has stopped verbally abusing other colonists.
LanguageData.Sadism.label: riendo sarcásticamente
LanguageData.Sadism.beginletter: {0} is brandishing HIS weapon with a sadistic look on HIS face.
LanguageData.Sadism.recoverymessage: {0}'s cruel frenzy has come to an end.
LanguageData.Compulsion.label: limpieza compulsiva
LanguageData.Compulsion.beginletter: {0} is obsessively cleaning HIS surroundings with little regard for HIS own wellbeing.
LanguageData.Compulsion.recoverymessage: {0} has stopped compulsively tidying HIS surroundings.
LanguageData.Berserk.label: enloquecido
LanguageData.Berserk.recoverymessage: {0}'s berserk rage has come to an end.
